title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
Here is a product listing based on the provided JSON data summaries:

**Product Title:** Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers

**Product Category:** Science & Engineering Kit

**Product Description:**

Winning the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award, this comprehensive kit is designed for intermediate learners who want to explore the fascinating world of structural engineering. With 285 pieces and 20 models to build, this set is perfect for students and enthusiasts alike.

**Key Features:**

* Build 20 different models, including bridges and skyscrapers, to learn about various structural elements such as columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary
* Explore the concepts of force, load, compression, tension, and mechanical physics
* Learn about the strength and stability of structures, as well as the strength and stiffness of materials
* Discover the principles of optimization for safety and cost
* Develop problem-solving skills through a series of 20 model-building experiments
* Illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide with 36 pages provides clear instructions and guidance

**Product Details:**

* Color: Blue
* Skill Level: Intermediate
* Model Count: 20
* Piece Count: 285
* Manual Pages: 36
* Award: Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner

**What's Included:**

* 285-piece construction set
* Illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide (36 pages)
* 20 model-building experiments

**Recommended for:**

* Students and enthusiasts of science, engineering, and architecture
* Intermediate learners looking to develop problem-solving skills and knowledge of structural engineering principles
* Parents and educators seeking a comprehensive and engaging STEM learning experience

**Order now and embark on a fascinating journey of discovery and creativity!**

**Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers**

**Award-Winning Science & Engineering Kit**

Winner of the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award, this comprehensive kit is designed to introduce intermediate-level learners to the fascinating world of structural engineering. With 285 pieces and 20 models to build, this kit provides a hands-on learning experience that's both fun and educational.

**Explore the Science Behind Bridges and Skyscrapers**

Through a series of 20 model-building experiments, learners will delve into the fundamental concepts of mechanical physics, structural engineering, and the strength and stability of structures. They'll discover how to optimize designs for safety and cost, and gain a deeper understanding of the forces that shape our built environment.

**Key Learning Concepts:**

* Force, load, compression, and tension
* Mechanical physics and structural engineering
* Strength and stability of structures
* Strength and stiffness of materials
* Optimization for safety and cost

**Structural Elements and Forces:**

* Columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary
* Tension, compression, shear, and bending forces

**Bridge Types:**

* Truss, arch, cantilever, rope, and suspension bridges

**Comprehensive Instruction Manual:**

* 36-page, fully illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide
* Clear instructions and diagrams to help learners build and understand each model

**Kit Details:**

* 285 pieces
* 20 models to build
* Intermediate skill level
* Blue-colored components
* Category: Science & Engineering Kit

**Unleash Your Child's Inner Engineer:**

With the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit, your child will develop essential skills in problem-solving, critical thinking, and creativity. Order now and watch them build a stronger understanding of the science behind the structures that shape our world!
